Package game

Class DifficultyLevel

java.lang.Object
game.DifficultyLevel
public class DifficultyLevel extends Object
Class which stores information of difficulty levels for the game

  • Constructor Details

    • DifficultyLevel

      public DifficultyLevel()
      Default constructor which creates the object of the class Difficulty.

    • DifficultyLevel

      public DifficultyLevel​(String difficulty, int minDungeonLength, int maxDungeonLength, int startingPotions, int maxMonsterEncounters, String textDescription)
      Non-default constructor which creates the object of the class Difficulty.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - Accepts the name of the difficulty level as a string.
      minDungeonLength - Accepts the minimum length of the dungeon for the difficulty level as an integer.
      maxDungeonLength - Accepts the maximum length of the dungeon for the difficulty level as an integer.
      startingPotions - Accepts the number of starting potions for the difficulty level as an integer.
      maxMonsterEncounters - Accepts the maximum number of monster encounters the player can have as an integer.
      textDescription - Accepts the description of the level as a string.
